Text: Your text can be shown here if you use the 'Text' column in the procedure file

You can use the text column to insert HTML.
  • There are no limits to how you use HTML
  • MDN- Mozilla Developer Network is a great resource to learn HTML
  • With minimal investment you can learn how to make lists like I am doing here
  • Hint: search MDN for ul, ol, and li HTML elements

Procedure Notes: By settings a Max Time of 'user' and Min Time of 4 people must stay on the trial for atleast 4 seconds but can end anytime after
By settings a Max Time of 15 and Min Time of 2 people must stay on the trial for atleast 2 seconds but can stay on the trial for UP TO 15 seconds. After 15 seconds it will automatically progress.
By settings a Max Time of 15 and Min Time of user people have UP TO 15 seconds (with no minimum time). After 15 seconds it will automatically progress.
